segments.text: Well , I'm thinking of going to see the ballet Swan Lake by the famous Russian National Ballet Troupe this evening at Beijing Grand Theater . Why don't you join me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to , but I've got to write a term paper . It will be due by this Thursday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You always work too hard , Jim . As the saying goes , all work and no play makes Jack a dull boy . You should spare some time for a rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it is no good for my health if I am staying in the classroom all day . But how about my paper ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just take it easy . Come on with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm terribly sorry I can't go with you . Shall we find some other time ?
segments.speaker: S2
